She doesn't need a lot of power though, does she? She can't attack and petrify on the same turn, so blocking would be more her speed. She's a blocker with deathtouch.

posts.post_content:
So according to the ruling, the counter does nothing, just for show. I am surprised there is no ruling on what happens when she leaves the battlefield. I am assuming the creatures are permanently stuck as colorless defenders who cant activate abilities even if they kill her.  
  
Also funny situation, you can use her ability on herself to block a protection from black creature.
posts.html:
